speakerOnep1: John Jiya Musa has a PhD in Soil and Water Engineering from the Department of Agricultural and Bioresources Engineering, Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, Ogun State. He is currently employed as a professor in the Department of Agricultural and Bioresources Engineering.
speakerOnep2: Prof. Musa is the Chairman of the University Seminar and Colloquium Committee and a member of several University, School, and Department committees. He has attended numerous local and international conferences and has over one hundred and eighty publications. He is ranked number one in his university and Nigeria in Soil and Water Engineering by the AD Scientific Index 2024.
speakerOnep3: His research interests include water quality management, soil conservation, irrigation management, environmental engineering, and hydrology.
speakerOnep4: Prof. Musa has served as a consultant for National and International Projects in Nigeria, including impact assessments for the Fadama Project and the Value Chain Development Program in various states. He is also a major irrigation and drainage engineering consultant for CSS Farms in Keffi, Nassarawa State.
speakerTwop1: Joshua Olanrewaju Olaoye had B. Eng. degree in Agricultural Engineering from University of Ilorin in 1990. He had his M. Eng. and Ph.D. in Agricultural Engineering from the same University in 1995 and 2004 respectively.
speakerTwop2: He joined the services of the University of Ilorin, Ilorin in 1998 as an academic and research staff in the Department of Agricultural and Biosystems Engineering of the University of Ilorin, Ilorin, Nigeria. Olaoye rose through the ranks to become Professor of Agricultural and Biosystems Engineering on October 1, 2017.
speakerTwop3: His research activities are in the areas of Farm Power and Machinery, Food Engineering, Bio-energy and Post-Harvest Engineering.
speakerTwop4: Olaoye registered with COREN in 2005 as a registered Engineer, Nigeria. He is also a member of many Local, National and International Associations and Professional bodies. He is a Fellow of Nigerian Institution of Agricultural Engineers (NIAE); Member, Nigerian Society of Engineers (NSE), Member American Society of Agricultural
